Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: மாறுபாடு இல்லாத உண்டி மறுத்துண்ணின் ஊறுபாடு இல்லை உயிர்க்கு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: There will be no disaster to one's life if one eats with moderation, food that is not disagreeable.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person is eating a meal that is perfectly in harmony with their body; it is not disagreeable ('மாறுபாடு இல்லாத உண்டி').
Layered_Composition.Midground: They are shown practicing moderation. Even though the food is good, they are shown stopping before they are completely full, refusing the last portion ('மறுத்துண்ணின்').
Layered_Composition.Background: Because of these two practices, their life-force ('உயிர்') is shown to be a strong, steady, and unharmed flame. There is no harm or danger to it ('ஊறுபாடு இல்லை').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: If one eats agreeable food in moderation, there will be no harm to one's life.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The act of refusing the last portion of food is the visual for moderation. The life-force as a strong, steady flame is the symbol for a healthy life.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A warm, gentle light. The food is wholesome. The flame of life is a bright, steady, golden color.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A medium shot that captures the person's act of moderation and the resulting strong flame of their life.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with a warm and healthy aesthetic.

Cultural_Anchors: No Harm to Life ('ஊறுபாடு இல்லை உயிர்க்கு')
